name: leadball
description:
What do you get when you have a little blue ball, a bunch of special tiles, and a checkered flag? A wickedly addictive game called leadball!

Guaranteed to give you loads of fun and excitement, leadball tests your skills in leading the tiny blue ball to its target tile. Sounds easy, but prepare to be challenged as you only have a few tiles to get the ball rolling to its destination.

The fun begins on a 3D square board consisting of gray tiles. The tile with a checkered symbol marks the spot where the ball has to roll to. The position varies on each level, so what works on one level may not work on the others. So keep your A game on!

Just how many ways you lead a little blue ball to its target? Use the special tiles to let the blue ball roll, slide, jump, or warp its way to the checkered tile.

Advance to the next level for an even more challenging round. Paths change, tiles disappear, and new special tiles emerge!

Key Features
• Clean design for clutter-free game experience
• Highly intuitive and easy controls
• 28 brain-racking levels
• Special tiles marked by symbols have different effects on the little blue ball
• The blue ball rolls, slides, jumps, or warps
• Difficulty increases as you advance to the next levels

Outsmart the system and anticipate possible hurdles and lead the little blue ball to its target tile with enough number of moves. Play wisely and unlock all the 28 levels one by one. Every level is a different kind of game and tests your patience even more.

Playing leadball is a good brain exercise as it lets you plan ahead and make calculated moves. Everyone can play the game, but only a chosen few can emerge victorious!
